Text:
The subs don't work correctly. There should be hardsubs for the nonenglish parts. There are only softsubs for everything - so you need subs for the entire movie just to know the indian parts.

Why are release groups becoming so lazy? Nearly all releases have this problem.
There are no hardsubs for the Indian parts.
I heard that this movie is one of the best so i was searching for better quality and i found it at https://crsh.me/bluray and i enjoyed watching it :)
